paragraphs: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm passionate about creating amazing digital experiences and solving complex problems through code.
This portfolio showcases my journey, projects, and skills. Feel free to explore and get in touch if you'd like to collaborate!

items.name: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with vanilla JavaScript
Features dark/light mode, dynamic content loading, and GitHub integration
Fully configurable through JSON with automated README generation

responsibilities: Performed hardware debugging and repair on electromechanical failures (3D printers/CNC), utilizing multimeters and oscilloscopes to troubleshoot signal integrity issues.3D Printers, CNC, Arduino, Raspberry Pi, Electromechanical systems
Instructed and Trained 250+ students in on- demand engineering concepts such as 3D CAD, Python, Electronics.

footer.tagline: Let's connect and build something amazing together!
